Name: Name Change, Kevin F. Conroy Ballfield at Greenwood Playground, Brooklyn
Title: A Local Law in relation to naming ten public thoroughfares and public places, Kevin F. Conroy Ballfield at Greenwood Playground, Borough of Brooklyn, Ilka Tanya Payan Memorial Park, Borough of Manhattan, Juan Pablo Duarte Square, Borough of Manhattan, Met Life Plaza, Borough of Queens, Vernon Cherry Way, Borough of Queens, Michael Brennan Way, Borough of Queens, The Street of Arts & Culture, Borough of Brooklyn, Battalion Chief Robert Turnerâ€™s Way, Borough of Brooklyn, Firefighter Christopher J. Siedenberg Memorial Park, Borough of Staten Island and Father Joseph David Colbert Way, Borough of Queens.
BodyName: Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations

History.AgendaNote: Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs and International Intergroup Relations

History.BodyName: Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations
Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations

Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

	Section 1.  The following playground name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.
_________________________________________________________________
New name 			Present name 			Limits___________                     

Kevin F. Conroy		(none)				an existing ballfield located 
Ballfield at Greenwood					within an existing playground
Playground							located at East 5th Street
								between Greenwood Avenue
								and Fort Hamilton Parkway
_________________________________________________________________

	Section 2.  The following park name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.
_________________________________________________________________
New name 			Present name 			Limits___________                     

Ilka Tanya Payan	(none)				an exiting park located on
Memorial Park 		West 156th Street between Riverside Drive and Broadway
_________________________________________________________________

      
      Section 3.  The following square name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.
_________________________________________________________________
New name 			Present name 			Limits___________                     

Juan Pablo Duarte	the northern side of 	between St. Nicholas
Square	West 170th Street		Avenue and Broadway
_________________________________________________________________

      Section 4.  The following plaza name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.
_________________________________________________________________
New name 			Present name 			Limits___________                     

Met Life Plaza		Bridge Plaza North		between 27th Street 
				a/k/a Queens Plaza		and 28th Street
_________________________________________________________________
      
      Section 5.  The following street name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.
_________________________________________________________________
New name 			Present name 			Limits___________

Vernon Cherry Way		Broadway			between 48th Street and
								51st Street
_________________________________________________________________

      Section 6.  The following street name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.
_________________________________________________________________
New name 			Present name 			Limits___________

Michael Brennan Way	41st Street			between 50th Avenue and 
								the Brooklyn Queens
								Expressway service road
_________________________________________________________________

      Section 7.  The following street name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.
      
_________________________________________________________________
New name 			Present name 			Limits___________

The Street of Arts		Rockwell Place		between Lafayette Avenue
& Culture							and DeKalb Avenue
_________________________________________________________________

      Section 8.  The following street name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.
_________________________________________________________________
New name 			Present name 			Limits___________

Battalion Chief Robert 	Hancock Street		between Stuyvesant 
Turner's Way							Avenue and Marcy Avenue
_________________________________________________________________

      
Section 9.  The following park name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.
_________________________________________________________________
New name 			Present name 			Limits___________

Firefighter Christopher	Evergreen Park		a park bounded by Greaves
J. Siedenberg Memorial					Lane, Greaves Avenue, 
Park								Dewey Avenue and 
								Evergreen Street contained
								in Block 4500, Lots 425, 500, 
								537 and 538 in the Borough
								of Staten Island 
_________________________________________________________________

      Section 10. The following street name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.
_________________________________________________________________
New name 			Present name 			Limits___________

Father Joseph David		68th Street			between Myrtle Avenue 
Colbert Way							and Cooper Avenue
_________________________________________________________________

	Section 11.  This local law shall take effect immediately.
